message: Hi, I’ve been trying many times but couldn’t get through. I need help understanding a charge on my auto insurance policy.
Hello, my name is Alex. I’m very sorry to hear you’ve had difficulty reaching us. Thank you for your patience. Let me help you resolve this charge right away.
Thanks. There’s a new charge on my statement for additional coverage, but I don’t remember agreeing to it.
I understand how this could be concerning. Let’s look into it together. First, can we complete security? Could you confirm your full name, date of birth, and policy number?
Sure. My name is Alan Davies, my date of birth is 13/02/1981, and my policy number is 302002-12121.

Thank you for completing security. I see the charge here—it’s for extended roadside assistance coverage, which was added on [Date]. Let me check how this was authorized. Could you hold for a moment while I review your account notes?
Yes, that’s fine. Thanks for checking.

Thank you for waiting. It seems the extended coverage was added after a phone call on [Date]. If this wasn’t something you intended to agree to, I can help you remove it and issue a refund for the charge. How would you like to proceed?
I don’t remember agreeing to that. Can you remove it and issue the refund, please?

Certainly. I’ve removed the extended roadside assistance coverage and initiated a refund for the charge. It should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days. I’ll also email you a confirmation of this update. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that’s everything. Thank you so much for your help!
You’re very welcome. I’m glad I could resolve this for you. If you need anything else, don’t hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
